p: The findings showed that the plant extracts had substantial disparities in their ability to compare ascorbic acid, which may also be ascribed to various characteristics, reaction, and mechanisms. Organic media can be used in solubilising DPPH radical chromogens. A strong positive correlation ( R 2 = 0.9399, p < 0.05) was observed between the activities. There was also a similar relationship in FRAP, where a strong positive linear correlation ( R 2 = 0.8143, p < 0.05) was found. FRAP also correlates with ABTS• + ( R 2 = 0.87), whereas ABTS• + showed a stiff positive association to VCEAC ( R 2 = 0.6784). The practical difference in these comparisons was DPPH•, which also correlates poorly with ABTS ( R 2 = 0.53).
